title: Training does not compute after first iteration
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

I try to train a network but the program freeze
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48990624/162236090-3a0c28b8-045a-4e4e-866a-cf0a57d6f24b.png)
As you can see the gpu is detected and it does few iterations but stops there almost instantly.
I tried every TF, cuda and cudnn trio possible and can't go further than that

### Operating System

operating system : win 10

### DeepLabCut version

dlc version : 
last (2.2.0.6)

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

gpu : gtx 1080TI

### Steps To Reproduce

1. activate dlc
2. ipython
3. import deeplabcut as dlc
4. dlc.launch_dlc()
In gui
5. Load project, go to train tab
6. select shuffle 4 (the last one in date, made in the same environnement)
7. open config
8. close it after check
9. update parameters button
10. run
11. notice failure
